title: Thursday, March 9, 2017
description: The sanctuary city movement can be traced to a single Presbyterian minister in 1980s Arizona. We tell the story. Guests: Scott Michels, a producer at Retro Report. For more information on today’s episode, visit http://nyti.ms/2mqkDX9.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
